Froala Editor Demo

Froala Editor is a lightweight WYSIWYG HTML Editor written in Javascript that enables rich text editing capabilities for your applications.

Key Features

  • Fast and lightweight - Only 50KB gzipped
  • Mobile friendly - Works on iOS and Android
  • Extensible - Over 30 plugins available
  • Cross-browser compatible - Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and IE11+

Text Formatting

The editor supports various text formats including bold, italic, underline, and strikethrough. You can also use inline code for technical content.

Special Characters

Mathematical expressions like x2 + y2 = z2 and chemical formulas like H2SO4 are supported.
